titleStmt.title: A Sermon preached in an Anabaptist meeting in Wapping, on Sunday the 19th of February by the reverend T.O., D.D. upon this text, Heb. Ch. XI, v. 1, Faith is the evidence of things not seen.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Zachariah Marshall near the long cellar in Wapping,

notesStmt.note: A satire against Titus Oates in the form of an imaginary sermon by Oates.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
